Articles.Content:
So this is a little strange and not IMO caused by any mod that I have. The images will hopefully be below but it happens when I fly straight up, and as I descend back downwards the map kinda just moves counterclockwise as if it's a hermit crab scuttling away... (counter-clockwise being opposed to the planet's already counter-clockwise motion.. so in that sense it would be clockwise. okay now i'm just confusing myself. I think a better way to explain it is the planet is turning and the patch seems to just stand still.) This is my first post so i'm sorry for it being unformatted and ditzy. 

Spoiler
Album EOJLs will appear when post is submitted

You know you can take screenshots in game with f1 right?

also can you provide your mod list?

That would help pinpoint what is causing the problem.

I'm using 

  • Kerbal Engineer
  • Kerbal Joint Reinforcement
  • Automatic Science Sampler
  • Procedural Wings
  • RCS Build Aid

I'll keep that whole F1 thing in mind from now on, I run KSP from the KSP Mod Manager so it doesn't start the gameoverlay.ui so I couldn't at the time press F12 take pictures with steam.
